alert.note: Alert for Adams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:34AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN LEWIS AND SOUTH CENTRAL ADAMS COUNTIES... At 1033 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tollesboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Tollesboro, Concord, Charters, Glen Springs, Carrs, Herron Hill, Epworth and Ribolt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
